string.text: I've got a mission.
Hm. And what a mission? What are you looking for? Or maybe you have found already? I've heard \nthere are piles of goods here...
I'm sorry, but I can't tell you, besides I've got no time.
Wait up there, buddy. You'll have your chance to run later... So what have you found? After all I'm not just wandering here.
What I found is mine.
I have found documents X18, barmen promised to pay good reward for it.
No, I haven't found anything.
I don't know, how did I get here I should fade away as soon as possible.
Haven't you found anything worthy of note? It's said, that information on experiments can be found somewhere here. It's paid good...
Nope, I haven't found anything.
Yeah?.. Think better! Are you trying to hide something from me?
No
What kind of talk is that?
Are you threatening me?
Damn all this information, I've made it out merely alive.
Okay, go on with you. If you find anything - I'll be nearby.

Listen here, in this very Zone I have gone through fire, anomalies, thick and thin monsters, but I'm 
still alive, as you may see! So, don't give instructions to me of what I should say and what I 
shouldn't. I'm here for the documents. And I won't leave without them. If you have these documents, I 
advise you to give them to me, otherwise you will stay in this hole forever! Got it?
Got... it.

If you're lying to me - you will have problems, if you have any ulterior motives - you will have troubles, if you palm off some crap to me - you will have troubles. Shortly, you have one big problem and you have to do your best to solve it! And now once again for the slow-witted personally - have you found the documents?
Take it easy, buddy. I told you, that I had found nothing. I swear!
That's more like it and next time - watch your tongue. And now go. If you find anything - I'll be nearby...
The talk is over and get out of my way.
I have no documents.
Well, yeah, I've found some information, but there seems to be nothing important.
That's better, dummy! And now give me all the information that you found. Everything till the very last document. And mind you don't joke with me - or it will be your last joke.
Halt, I said! I'm not just wandering in this hole. Don't play dumb, take out what you've found. We'll share, perhaps...
I'm not gonna share anything with you.
Well, get a hell out of here... But here is my advice - watch your feet, try not to stumble, stalker!
Do you threaten me?
Okay, okay.. don't be so nervous... I was just curious and you grip the gun at once! No more questionnaires. Good luck.
Documents you say.... This is right what I have come here for, to your consideration. And now you will give them to me and take off. You got that?
I'll have something to offer.
Listen, bro, don't make my head spin. Lets make a deal. I'll give you fair money, you won't regret that.
Listen, I really need these documents. We'll see what you've got - and I think we'll make a deal...
It's dark here, pitch-dark. Burers are around there... And why have you agreed? How did you get here?
Follow your way, stalker.

I can't stand when my natter is interrupted. In short, I've come here for important documents. If you found anything - take it out, otherwise you'll have many troubles. If you found nothing, get lost and don't waste my time.
I hate, when the talk is interrupted! Take out the documents, if you don't want to stay here forever.
Ok
Oh, damn it, take them. These are not really important documents.
Bye.
